requirements.summary: Remove the Caffeine AI attribution/watermark line from the footer while preserving the rest of the footer content and layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer displays any text like "Built with" / "using" / "caffeine.ai" or any heart icon used specifically for that attribution.
No outbound link to https://caffeine.ai/ (including any UTM parameters) is present in the rendered footer HTML.
Footer layout remains visually consistent and does not show empty gaps where the attribution used to be.

file_operations.description: Remove the rendered attribution row content in the footer (the "Built with â€¦ using caffeine.ai" text, Heart icon, and caffeine.ai link with UTM params), keeping the rest of the footer sections intact and ensuring the bottom row still renders cleanly without spacing gaps.

requirements.summary: Clean up now-unused imports/variables that existed only for the removed footer attribution so the frontend builds cleanly.
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend build passes with no unused import/unused variable errors or warnings introduced by removing the attribution.
No other UI sections are modified as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Remove now-unused code introduced solely for the caffeine.ai attribution, including the Heart icon import and any variables/computed values used only to form the caffeine.ai URL (e.g., appIdentifier), ensuring no unused-import/unused-variable warnings remain.
